caption: A woman in helmet and a man in white are chatting. The man is making various gestures to explain things, and the woman starts eating from a lunchbox while he watches. She then takes out a notebook and starts drawing in it. They communicate and gesture to each other. Suddenly, the woman runs off, leaving the man behind. The man opens an email on his computer. A woman in a green outfit walks over and playfully pats the man's head. A group of people are swimming in the water. A man in green and a woman in white chat by the pool. Meanwhile, the man in white is cooking stew inside the house.
